title: condoras
author: condoras
content: As the title says, I have Bitcoin and I want 100 EUR PayPal at preev rate 1:1. Trusted members only or members that I have dealt with in the past and I prefer that you go first. Anyone who has an interest to fill this, post here.Thank you in advance.

comments.author: Legion13
comments.body: Finished this trade from OP. Quick and easy as always.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: Legion13 on November 27, 2022, 12:08:47 PMFinished this trade from OP. Quick and easy as always. Once again a quick and easy trade. Thank you!
